reviewText:
I expected the equivalent of trout porn, only for bonefish. We bought this to get in the mood for our upcoming trip to Grand Bahama. I'm sorry to sailed that we were underwhelmed by it. Yes, it has some nice bonefish fly fishing scenes, but I found Brokaw's narration soporific, and all the episodes were just about the same. Both my wife and I fell asleep at different moments while watching the episodes.
To add insult to injury, the message of who made possible the series kept popping up every time the original broadcast would have cut to commercial. Really?
